faq.subtitle: Get quick answers about our live tools and interactive experience

interactions.question: How do live interactions work?
interactions.answer: Every gift, like, or comment from your viewers triggers live feedback and animations. Our system captures it all in real time to create an immersive experience.

customize.question: Can I customize the actions triggered by gifts?
customize.answer: Absolutely! Assign points, sounds to any gift. You're fully in control of the audience experience.

tiktok.question: Is the platform optimized for TikTok?
tiktok.answer: Yes, everything is built around TikTok's live infrastructure. Low latency, real-time events, and native TikTok support out of the box.

support.question: What kind of support do I get?
support.answer: We offer 24/7 Discord support, onboarding help, and full documentation. Plus, you can join our creator community to get tips and tricks!

cta.description: Engage your audience in real-time with powerful tools built for creators who want results now.
